attributes.action: Amend the Restriction of Prime Minister of calling elections in the FTPA (2011)
attributes.additional_details: The referenced crisis is the Brexit crisis and the Constitutional Crisis ongoing at this current moment in time
attributes.background: The Fixed Term Parliament Act removed the ability of the PM to call an election without Parliamentary consent. With a time of crisis such as now, the Fixed Term Parliament Act must be amended so the Prime Minister can call an Election.
